content.text: Concord Hotel - Jewish Singles weekend sit us Down at table with ugly girls & I told them Don't you have any Pretty ones. We get in Room Jack says Don't touch my hair, you Dump water Right on his head then we set Room on fire. throwing food in Dining Room, No one would serve us - so they Put us By Kitchen. Gave us all our Money Back & told us to Leave & Never come Back

text_sections.full_transcription: Concord Hotel - Jewish Singles weekend sit us Down at table with ugly girls & I told them Don't you have any Pretty ones. We get in Room Jack says Don't touch my hair, you Dump water Right on his head then we set Room on fire. throwing food in Dining Room, No one would serve us - so they Put us By Kitchen. Gave us all our Money Back & told us to Leave & Never come Back

insights: Narrative about disruptive behavior at Concord Hotel
References inappropriate behavior including setting room on fire
Describes being ejected from hotel and banned
